title: Aw, Nuts!
description: Squirrel loves acorns.When he spots the perfect one, he must have it! But it bounces away. . . .So he jumps into a taxi, but the taxi runs out of gas.Aw, nuts!He bounces on a pogo stick, but he falls into a hole.Aw, nuts!Will Squirrel be able to catch up to the most delicious acorn ever?
author: Rob McClurkan
